inner.jar looks as such:

```
inner.jar
|-- META-INF/
    |-- MANIFEST.MF
|-- BOOT-INF/
    |-- lib/
        |-- jackson-annotations-2.13.0.jar
            |-- META-INF/
                |-- MANIFEST.MF
        |-- log4j-api-2.14.jar
            |-- META-INF/
                |-- MANIFEST.MF
            |-- inner-jar/
                |-- META-INF/
                    |-- MANIFEST.MF
               |-- log4j-2.14.0.jar
                   |-- META-INF/
                       |-- MANIFEST.MF
```
